item.title: Neige Particles
item.description: A TouchDesigner projection showcased during Nuit Blanche 2023 at Le LOREM. Searching for interaction in our internal projects using Kinect2. This project makes use of how the digital eye breaks things down to pixels or a times point clouds. One could imagine it’s similar to the snow or dust that falls from above. Are we aware of our begining and end as something so tiny as dust? Would we prefer flowers? They are in the ground too. Are we to expire or is posible that we have some essence of ourselves that lives on?
